attributes.action: Introduce a sensible road pricing scheme (where all funds raised are ring fenced for environmental issues) sooner rather than later.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A variable road-pricing scheme will encourage us to use our roads more wisely and efficiently.  More considered journeys at sensible times of day might change our behaviour ... avoiding rush hour queues, encouraging flexible working hours, working from home, etc. BUT the money raised MUST be ring-fenced for better public transport, supporting energy efficient actions and enhanced provision of information.  You know it makes sense.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
